alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chambers, southeastern Liberty and east central Harris Counties through 115 PM CST... At 1229 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mont Belvieu, or 8 miles south of Dayton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baytown, Deer Park, Liberty, Dayton, Beach City, Highlands, Barrett, Channelview, Mont Belvieu, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Daisetta, Hardin, Kenefick, Cove, Morgan`s Point, Dayton Lakes, San Jacinto State Park and eastern Houston Ship Channel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
